overview: Asexual creatures frolic left and right before the eyes of little children? A film that explores, in a light and amusing manner, what Walt Disney movies and, more generally speaking, movies for children, might potentially contain. Also, I wanted to play with colliding recycled super-8 shots with a little song by Colette Renard, found on magnetic tape at a flea market in the nineties... - Olivier Fouchard
title: Walt Disney's Ex Prod
